title: Competitive Gold/Plat Team Looking to Fill Out a Roster! (Top, Jungle, Mid)
body:
We are a new LATE NIGHT team looking to fill out our roster. This team is being restarted from scratch so please be patient when considering applying. We are looking to play most nights consistently and look to compete in various tournaments. We are looking for players in gold/plat to apply but will consider impressive players of any rank. Do NOT add me in game before posting, once you've posted here feel free to add me in game at: IamBattleField

Current Roster:
Top: TBA
Jungle: TBA
Mid: TBA
ADC: IamBattleField
Support: mDc1g

Must Haves:
1. A working microphone
2. A fluency in English
3. Discord
4. Be 17+ years old
5. Availability evenings from 12am+ EST most days
6. A sense of humor...although this is a competitive team that does not mean we don't know how to have a good time.

What We Expect:
- A confident player that understands and mains 1 role.
- A consistent schedule (if your schedule varies from week to week, please consider this before applying)
- Maturity and the ability to relax and take things serious when it comes time to play.
- A willingness to learn, communicate, synergize. and grow as a team.
- dedication!

Application Form (copy and paste this into your post):
-- Summoner Name:
-- Current rank/elo:
-- Age:
-- times available:
-- Role applying for:
-- Top 5 champs in role:
-- Playstyle:
-- Past experience with teams:
-- Why are you interested in us:

replies.body:
-- Summoner Name: UltimaSpirit
-- Current rank/elo: Gold 1
-- Age: 24
-- times available: I work full time, but most nights are open.
-- Role applying for: Top
-- Top 5 champs in role: Urgot.... I'm a bit of a one trick but can sub in and learn other champs very quickly.
-- Playstyle: Opportunistic. Always looking to make plays around the map.
-- Past experience with teams: This would be my first experience in a team environment.
-- Why are you interested in us: I am looking to experience a new aspect of the game, in a more organized fashion.

-- Summoner Name: Annie and Chill
-- Current rank/elo: Gold 3
-- Age: 18
-- times available: Whenever I am needed.
-- Role applying for: Top
-- Top 5 champs in role: Gnar, Yasuo, Lissandra, Renekton, Kennen
-- Playstyle: Aggressive, but I know how to be passive and have no problem with it.
-- Past experience with teams: I've played on many teams and use to coach high ELO teams.
-- Why are you interested in us: I've been very bored and have little better to do with my time, and it sounds like fun.

-- Summoner Name: Åerah
-- Current rank/elo: g3
-- Age: 18
-- times available: almost always, have classes here and there
-- Role applying for: jungle
-- Top 5 champs in role: lee, j4, olaf, ww
-- Playstyle: Insanely smart mechanically/aggro'ish
-- Past experience with teams: Been on plenty of teams/tourneys everything
-- Why are you interested in us: I like the team environment

Gato Peligroso 
TOP
Friends with Frame

-- Summoner Name: ImFramePerfect
-- Current rank/elo: Plat 5 1750-1800 mmr
-- Age: 23
-- times available: whenever needed 
-- Role applying for: Midlane
-- Top 5 champs in role: Zed/Azir/Ekko/Xerath/Vel'koz
-- Playstyle: Depends on hero Im playing/matchups, 
-- Past experience with teams: Have played in 5s teams before, always consistently did well. Was never toxic, willing to learn new heroes for different comps. 
-- Why are you interested in us: Past team disbanded due to fighting between other players/egos, want new team to play with competitively

-- Summoner Name: k1ssmyl1ps
-- Current rank/elo: Gold 5
-- Age: 21
-- times available: midnight till 3 am est
-- Role applying for: Top
-- Top 5 champs in role: Cho Gath, Malphite, Fiora, Vladimir, Maokai
-- Playstyle: I usually play in the middle not too aggro and not too passive( this is only in lane) in teamfights I usually become really aggressive depending on the comp can peel or focus the carries. I don’t usually take 50/50 risks. I’ll only go for it when I know I will win that’s why I have a high win rate in my account. 
-- Past experience with teams: I’ve been with 3 teams before won 2 tournaments and finished 4th on the 3rd one 
-- Why are you interested in us: Playing with different types of players helps me understand different styles of players which improves the way I play the game.

Summoner Name: Skinnyboybig (may be changing name soon ill comment if i do)
-- Current rank/elo: G5 (was gold 1 last season)
-- Age: 23
-- times available: anytime after 10pm- 4am EST ( can be earlier just saying 10 b/c that is always available)
-- Role applying for: Mid
-- Top 5 champs in role: Ekko Galio Diana Kassidin Yas, but i have a very large champ pool can play almost all champs well. those are just my best
-- Playstyle: I like to say my playstyle is more about whats going on around the map. I like to make impact on the game more then just my lane, I like to spill my lead into other lanes in the game from what I been experiencing that is the best way to win in solo q. But i can play assassins mages tanks
-- Past experience with teams: None been playing league for 4 years now just starting to get serious about it.
-- Why are you interested in us: Seem that we both have common interest, and since you are looking for players G and above I thought you may take me seriously then other teams that are only looking for the highest rank available. And I believe I can become a better player because we can always improve no matter how good you think you are.

-- Summoner Name: Dad Scissorer
-- Current rank/elo: Gold 5
-- Age: 17
-- times available: 8:30 pm - 3 am Central Time; most the day friday-monday
-- Role applying for: Jungle
-- Top 5 champs in role: Warwick, Jarvan IV, Xin Zhao, Jax, and gonna learn Sejuani
-- Playstyle: I like to play tanks and focus engaging/frontlining/peeling for the carries.
-- Past experience with teams: Never been on a team
-- Why are you interested in us: I'd like to have a group to play and improve with. I have really good communication and team work skills. My macro game understanding is really nice as well.

This might be a match made in heaven or possibly not. But we are a gold/plat team as well who are looking for a bot lane for late night practice. I posted a few days ago https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/team-recruitment/6Pd7f1fl-team-lightning-lf-goldplat-bot-lane . Message me so we can talk. I have my team signed up for a league already on wednesdays.

-- Summoner Name: stavigods
-- Current rank/elo: unranked (was silver 1)
-- Age: 22
-- times available: anytime for tryout
-- Role applying for: mid
-- Top 5 champs in role: viktor,vlad,jayce,azir,ekko
-- Playstyle: aggressive carry
-- Past experience with teams: 1 team, 1 tournament
-- Why are you interested in us: looking to improve
-- Side note: i think i play better than a silver and id like a tryout
cant type rn cause im on my phone but plat 3 mid laner who used to be diamond once plays syndra/ziggs/lux/irelia mainly but can play every other mage too except taliyah i hate that champ.

-- Summoner Name:JPBTW
-- Current rank/elo:G5
-- Age:23
-- times available:anytime
-- Role applying for:support
-- Top 5 champs in role:thresh,bard,alister,shen,naut,
-- Playstyle:aggressive 
-- Past experience with teams:none
-- Why are you interested in us:lost a goal or a need to get better feel like a team would push me to a new lvl
f you are looking for a tournament to join come join for the Legends Cup Season 1 play ins! Here is a link to our disc message me with any questions https://discord.gg/Nbd7V5

-- Summoner Name: Dotrix
-- Current rank/elo: G2
-- Age: 21
-- times available: All nights after 9:30PM EST (I want some weekends off though to hang out with IRL friends)
-- Role applying for: Mid
-- Top 5 champs in role: Viktor Ori Azir Syndra Brand
-- Playstyle: Defensive, consistent, focusing on teamfights
-- Past experience with teams: Played in local college tournaments and a few online tournament networks including RPL, Oasis and more.
-- Why are you interested in us: I'm looking for a like minded team to grow and improve with, eventually to kick ass in Clash as well hopefully. I also hate solo queue.
